ingredients.item: 3 tbsp Waitrose Reduced Fat Caesar Dressing

instructions.step: Cook the broad beans in boiling water for 3 minutes, drain and cool. Halve the chicken thighs. Heat half the oil in a small frying pan and gently fry the chicken pieces for 10-12 minutes, turning once, until cooked through with no pink meat. Lift out onto a board. Tear the bread into pieces and add to the frying pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the bread is lightly toasted. Thinly slice the chicken.
Combine the lettuce, Parmigiano Reggiano, croutons, chicken and beans in a bowl and season. Scatter with the chives and drizzle with the Caesar dressing to serve.
